document.full_text: virginia commonwealth, in fact, might be the basketball equivalent of susan boyle. in a competition famous for its upsets, the rams having made it to houston may be the most unlikely occurrence in the history of the tournament.
document.title: fivethirtyeight: in tournament of upsets, v.c.u. has overcome longest odds
lines_and_colors: virginia commonwealth, in fact, might be the basketball equivalent of susan boyle. in a competition famous for its upsets, the rams having made it to houston may be the most unlikely occurrence in the history of the tournament.
